block.name: Multicorrelator State Machine (v1)
block.doc:
State machine for multicorrelation.
Performs a search for the highest correlation value.
Sends commands of the form: PMT::Pair(PMT::String name, PMT::u32vector vals)
where 'name' is the name of the "Controlled Delay" block to receive the command and 'vals' is a element vector of the new delay values to use.
Takes commands of the form: PMT::String("RESET")
which causes the state machine to reset and restart it's search.
Algorithm: values = [0 | i <- [0..max_delay-1] ]
for delay = [0..max_delay-1] set_delay(delay) value[delay] = get_corr_value()
max_val = max(values) best_delay = values.index_of(max_value)
The main for loop is performed in parallel by groups of 3.
